name: Nyoman!
greetingText: Your nickname Omang is cute btw
wishText: Ask Tara what it means, hehehe
text1: I don't know why am I doing this but...
textInChatBox: 24 years ago today, you were born and the world became a better place to live in. Oh, you're also a doctor now! Way to go!!! You've done a great job so far. I just want to take a moment to appreciate your existence. You know how to make even the most ordinary day feel special. I love spending time with you and I bet many other people feel the same way too! I wish you all the best things the world can offer. I'm so proud of your every little-to-big achievement every single day. I'm happy to be able to share my small winnings with you, too.
text2: I wanted to give you a handmade hat, or a pair of warm socks
text3: or a cake, or anything sweet and delicate,
text4: But I realized the best present I can give is
text5Entry: Because even though I'm not gifted but,
text5Content: I claim to be the gift
outroText: You might want to check this one out too
